widgetContentColor.desc: Misc. background color to be overlayed over widget chrome [widgetColor]. Eg. Table header row

widgetAccentColor.desc: 4 colours which should be complementary to each other and should have a decent contrast against [widgetColor]. These colors are critical in determining the overall color character and profile of the theme. IMPORTANT: color1 & color2 should be HIGH CONTRAST relative to [widgetColor] and color3 & color4 should be LOW CONTRAST relative to [widgetColor] character of the theme. C Eg a notification dot, or the application background gradient.

widgetAlternatingColor.desc: Misc. background alternating colors to be overlayed over widget chrome [widgetColor]. Eg. Table rows

widgetModalBackgroundColor.desc: Background color overlaid over screen when a modal widget is being displayed

titleFontColor.desc: Font color overlaid over [titleColor]. Use a high contrast value

titleGradientColor.desc: Widget Title chrome gradient colors color1=topRight, color2=bottomRight, color3=bottomLeft, color4=topLeft

typographyColor.desc: Font color overlaid over primarily [widgetColor]. Use a high contrast value

selection.desc: Selection foreground and background color overlaid over primarily [widgetColor]. Foreground and background colors should have a high contrast value. Eg. Table selected row text (foreground) and background

hover.desc: Hover foreground and background color overlaid over primarily [widgetColor]. Foreground and background colors should have a high contrast value. Eg. Table hovered row text (foreground) and background

appearance.desc: Flag for whether the corners are rounded for the element.

foregroundColor.desc: Foreground color for a widget element. Use high contrast againt element [backgroundColor] and full alpha is recommended. Eg Text in a TextBox or Slider drag element

backgroundColor.desc: Background color for a widget element. Use high contrast againt [widgetColor] and full alpha is recommended. Eg background of a TextBox or the background of Slider element

foregroundAlpha.desc: Hovered and unhovered foreground color for a widget element

backgroundAlpha.desc: Hovered and unhovered background color for a widget element
